Module RMA
Package RMA

Class RMAFormController

  • java.lang.Object
    • RMA.RMAFormController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class RMAFormController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    RMAFormController contains the logic and field references to the GUI controls on the RMAForm.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private javafx.scene.control.Button btnCancel
      btnCancel closes the form without saving.
      private javafx.scene.control.Button btnSave
      btnSave saves the RMA to the database.
      private javafx.scene.control.Button btnSaveClose
      btnSaveClose saves the RMA to the database and then closes the form.
      private boolean businessConnectionError
      businessConnectionError is used to track whether the user had a connection error while selecting a value for the Business, so that selecting the same value will allow it to try again.
      private boolean businessRevert
      businessRevert is used to revert back to the old Business selection without prompting again.
      private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox cbShipIndicator
      cbShipIndicator indicates that the return/replacement has been shipped.
      private javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<CustomerAddress> cmbBusinessName
      cmbBusinessName contains the list of business names for the selected customer name in the database.
      private javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> cmbCreditReplaceRepair
      cmbCreditReplaceRepair contains the values Credit, Replace, and Repair, used to determine which action we will be taking on the return.
      private javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> cmbCustomerName
      cmbCustomerName contains list of customer names in the database.
      private javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> cmbDisposition
      cmbDisposition contains the list of disposition in the database.
      private javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> cmbPoNumber
      cmbPoNumber contains the PO numbers associated with the selected business name.
      private javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<PurchaseOrderProduct> cmbProduct
      cmbProduct contains the list of PurchaseOrderProducts for the chosen PO number in the database.
      private javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> cmbReasonCode
      cmbReasonCode contains the list of return reason codes in the database.
      private javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<java.lang.String> cmbRMAStatus
      cmbRMAStatus contains list of RMA Statuses in the database.
      private boolean customerConnectionError
      customerConnectionError is used to track whether the user had a connection error while selecting a value for the Customer so that selecting the same value will allow it to try again.
      private boolean customerRevert
      customerRevert is used to revert back to the old Customer selection without prompting again.
      private javafx.scene.control.DatePicker dtpkrReplaceRepairShipDate
      dtpkrReplaceRepairShipDate allows the user to choose the date when we will be shipping back the replacement or repair.
      private javafx.scene.control.Label lblOwnerValue
      lblOwnerValue shows the employee username assigned to the RMA upon saving.
      private javafx.scene.control.Label lblRMANumberValue
      lblRMANumberValue displays the assigned RMA number on save.
      private RMAFormModel model
      model is the data model for the RMAForm.
      private boolean poConnectionError
      poConnectionError is used to track whether the user had a connection error while selecting a value for the PO Number, so that selecting the same value will allow it to try again.
      private boolean poRevert
      poRevert is used to revert back to the old PO Number selection without prompting again.
      private javafx.scene.control.TextArea txtAddInfoSpecialInt
      txtAddInfoSpecialInt is used to store any additional instructions about the return entered by the user.
      private javafx.scene.control.TextArea txtDispositionNotes
      txtDispositionNotes allows the user to enter in notes about the chosen disposition.
      private javafx.scene.control.TextArea txtInitialEvaluation
      txtInitialEvaluation allows the user to enter in their initial evaluation of the returned product(s).
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField txtQuantity
      txtQuantity is used to enter the customer's return quantity.
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField txtReplaceRepairTracking
      txtReplaceRepairTracking allow to enter the tracking number for the replacement or repair being shipped back to the customer.
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField txtReturnLabelTrack
      txtReturnLabelTrack is used to store the return label tracking number.
      private javafx.scene.control.TextArea txtShippingAddress
      txtCustomerInfoShip is used to show the shipping address associated with the selected business, and auto populates when business name is selected.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RMAFormController()
      Default empty constructor, used when FXMLLoader loads the fxml file.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected void btnCancelOnAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      btnCancelOnAction closes the screen without saving.
      protected void btnSaveCloseAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      btnSaveCloseAction Saves the RMA and all the data into the database and closes the form.
      protected void btnSaveOnAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      btnSaveOnAction Saves the RMA and all the data into the database.
      void cmbBusinessNameOnHidden​(javafx.event.Event event)
      cmbBusinessNameOnHidden checks, after the dropdown menu closes, whether the user had experienced a businessConnectionError, and if so, attempts the query again to populate PO Number.
      void cmbCustomerNameOnHidden​(javafx.event.Event event)
      cmbCustomerNameOnHidden checks, after the dropdown menu closes, whether the user had experienced a customerConnectionError, and if so, attempts the query again to populate Business Name.
      void cmbPONumberOnHidden​(javafx.event.Event event)
      cmbPONumberOnHidden checks, after the dropdown menu closes, whether the user had experienced a poConnectionError, and if so, attempts the query again to populate Product.
      void getInitialRMAOptions()
      getInitialRMAOptions fetches the Customer names, Return Reason Codes, RMA Statuses, and Dispositions from the database.
      void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle rb)
      initialize ties together the GUI's elements with the RMAFormModel and creates any necessary ChangeListeners on the controls.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL url,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle rb)
        initialize ties together the GUI's elements with the RMAFormModel and creates any necessary ChangeListeners on the controls. (Requirement 4.1.1, 4.2.1, 4.4.1, 4.4.1.1, 4.7.1, 4.7.3.1, 4.9.1, 4.11.1, 4.11.2, 4.12.1, 4.18, 4.18.1, 4.18.2., 4.18.3, 4.18.4)
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        url - The URL location of the fxml file that describes the RMAForm window elements and their layout.
        rb - ResourceBundle that contains locale-specific data.

      • cmbCustomerNameOnHidden

        public void cmbCustomerNameOnHidden​(javafx.event.Event event)
        cmbCustomerNameOnHidden checks, after the dropdown menu closes, whether the user had experienced a customerConnectionError, and if so, attempts the query again to populate Business Name.
        Parameters:
        event - The Event passed to the method.

      • cmbBusinessNameOnHidden

        public void cmbBusinessNameOnHidden​(javafx.event.Event event)
        cmbBusinessNameOnHidden checks, after the dropdown menu closes, whether the user had experienced a businessConnectionError, and if so, attempts the query again to populate PO Number.
        Parameters:
        event - The Event passed to the method.

      • cmbPONumberOnHidden

        public void cmbPONumberOnHidden​(javafx.event.Event event)
        cmbPONumberOnHidden checks, after the dropdown menu closes, whether the user had experienced a poConnectionError, and if so, attempts the query again to populate Product.
        Parameters:
        event - The Event passed to the method.

      • getInitialRMAOptions

        public void getInitialRMAOptions()
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        getInitialRMAOptions fetches the Customer names, Return Reason Codes, RMA Statuses, and Dispositions from the database. (Requirement 4.5.1)
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If there is an issue connecting to the database.
